name: Cucumber Marketing Inc.
description:
You found us! Let’s grow together.
Cucumber was created [in 2008] as a place for highly-motivated individuals to live their talents, have the courage to try out crazy ideas and grow personally and professionally through their 9-to-5.
Planted in the heart of Downtown Vancouver; we do marketing, code websites, study consumer buying behaviour, write fresh stories and help cool brands grow.
Is your brand ready for a long-overdue refresh?
